Brilliant potential; APPALLING execution.

Firstly: even for an asymmetric horror game, this game is horrendously unbalanced. Playing on your own as a survivor can be a living hell against even just a mediocre killer because of how hard they've been nerfed, while as killer you can stand absolutely no chance against a 3/4 man Survive With Friends party. The game developers seemingly ignore the community's wishes as shown by the lack of changes made to updates after PTBs and some issues have still not been fixed over half a year's worth of waiting.

Optimisation is absolutely terrible. The OPENING CINEMATIC (which you can't disable even in config files because EAC throws a fit) can lag your computer with a massive input lag that prevents you from skipping it quickly, even very good computers are unable to run the game at a high framerate on good graphics and you will always experience some sort of lag spike during your gameplay.

This game used to be fun but somehow with every update the optimisation gets worse, along with the gameplay, along with the countless bugs and exploits, along with pretty much everything even in the game and yet the developers do absolutely nothing.

PS. They don't take responsibility for their own bugs and exploits, even going as far as to REVOKE OVER 800 HOURS WORTH OF PROGRESS as a 'punishment' for accidentally abusing a very small exploit that gave absolutely no advantage to any players in the actual gameplay itself. Instead of banning hackers and toxic players, BHVR spends their time making poor cosmetics and revoking progress from those unfortunate enough to stumble upon one of the game's many bugs and exploits. This game has turned into a complete and utter cash grab ever since the store came out pretty much exactly 1 year ago. I dont know if someone else was suddenly put in charge but this game has gone completely downhill.

Because i love SAW the movie, i had my attention towards the SAW DLC with this game; bought it, and instantly loved this game

The game is exciting and amazing, playing as a survivor is great because there are so many ways a game can be like, for example, you can search through the boxes scattered around the map and obtain a item, rare or common, or even ultra rare.
Teamwork is important and fun to conduct as a survivor, going up against each killer has its own different element of playstyle which makes it interesting to just do the simplest things as a survivor. 
It is so exciting to play the "hide and seek" with the killer, you can play stealth like how you would in Metal Gear Solid games and hide behind a tree, or in a locker as the killer runs past you and they won't even know it! 
i like how for the survivors, no 2 games are the same, each is played differently and makes you need to make smart decisions, or think very quickly - otherwise you will be hunted and killed in a violent attack by the killer.

As for the killer, this is also very fun, i main one killer (Pig-Head (from the SAW movies)) and i have to say, it's so impressive how the developers made the Pig-Head behave and sound exactly like she does in the movies, the detail about the killers is mind-blowing, same goes for the other killers who are from their own movies like:

Ghostface (Scream)
Leatherface (The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 
and the "Shape"

each killer has their own way of tremendous fun of playing the game, for example, the killer i play Pig-Head, uses reverse bear traps like in the movies as tool to make players need to search for a jigsaw apparatus to try and get it off, which is very fun to use and to own in the game

As for the community, i think it's fantastic. Team mates WANT to help you out when your a survivor, if you're hooked or wounded, your team mates seem to help you out like they are very desperate, which is nice because the game is designed to work in your favour if the survivors all remain alive, so you might as well help out, which makes a nice community appear in the game.

The game modes are super fun, level ups are so addictive and great to look forward to, playing with friends is so fun that it's so hard to stop playing the game - the list goes on, no 2 games are the same and every game tests your brain, forcing you to make the correct decisions and to think smart.

highly suggest playing this game, i rate it 10/10 of course. 
(i found the hatch by mistake on my first playthrough, still haven't actually won a game by using it - other than a private 1vs1 where someone dropped me there to get the achievement!)

Честно говоря игра мне эта не очень зашла,ниже опишу почему.
Плюсы:
- Хорошая графика.
- Если играть не в соло то можно поугарать.
Минусы:
- Ужасный подбор игроков. Например я новичок с 2-мя часами игры,как в то время меня закидывает к задротам имея 2-3к часов игры,которые наизусть знают карту,фичи и т.д
- Проблема с хитбоксами или что-то в этом роде,к примеру когда ты ударил выжившего,а игра сказала,иди в ж0пу и в итоге 0 урона.
- Геймплей. По началу он кажется интересным,но потом все больше и больше начинает надоедать. Цель игры такова,выжившие должны спастись от убийцы, для этого надо завести 5 генераторов,открыть любые ворота и свалить, за убийцу обратное, не дать выжившим спастись ВСЁ! это весь геймплей,однобразный и со временем становится не интересным,даже ксчный геймплей кажется интереснее чем это.

В принципе игра на вкус и цвет,лично мне не зашла, и я не понимаю как люди играют в это по 2к часов,но мне уже за 2 часа эта игра надоела,и стала не интересной.

Are you waiting for me to say something else? 

Because there really isn't much of a point for me to go into great detail. It's a mash-up of hide-and-seek and the game of tag, set in a horror-esque environment and characters. There are many maps but not a whole lot of mechanics to this game. You can crouch, sprint,  hide in wardrobes, repair V8s and search crates for useful items and perform a few interactions with other survivors, i.e unhooking them, patching them up etc. There are also many perks for you to choose from that will either help you survive the ordeal or make more sacrifices. One could argue that the game seriously lacks mechanics, but you know that didn't stop us enjoying playing hide-and-seek when we were young, so why should it now?

The mind games are definitely engaging and fun, usually the team will be divided into those who spend their whole time on a hook and those that actually meticulously make progress, adapting to the kerfuffle caused by their team mates and making the most of it. 

This isn't a game you will be playing match after match after match, it's more of something you play for the occasional fun time running around from the murderous b*stard, who is the killer. Well, I don't know, perhaps I shouldn't say that, maybe there are people who play this game religiously, who can say. 
All in all, I definitely recommend this game on sale, if you need more convincing, have a look at other people's reviews, I am sure some delved in greater detail, but like I already mentioned, it's a very simple game.

Repetitive pile of garbage

Never actually bothered writing a review for a game but this game is just being ruined for me by the community and unless the devs make some changes to the core gameplay I won't be reinstalling it. The game is somewhat designed to make camping a waste of time but it also promotes it. Around 50 percent of my games revolve around me getting taken down to the basement (Which needs to be removed as it heavily promotes camping) and having the killer sit there and wait for me to die either because they are bad at the game and it's the only way they can get kills or they are just trying to get daily rituals done which sometimes also promote camping. Until some systems are put in place to prevent or make it a really dumb idea to camp then this game will remain uninstalled and thumbs down which is a shame because I really enjoy this game when I have a decent team and killer.

fun, but there is a massive toxic group of survivor mains

首先是，通过它认识到了许许多多的人。天南海北的距离，可以被它在无声间消融，化为欢乐、紧张等等多样的、在生活中不易获取到的情感，实在是让人惊喜的一件事。从发着呆哆哆嗦嗦地蹲在角落，到当面拿命拆火图腾，与其说是胆子变大了，其实还是对dbd更加了解了。尤其是，修着机看大佬的神操作、被三下五除二地轻松打趴的时候，会从开始的不安转变为期待。值得期待的有很多很多东西——会有哪个好心人来救我吗？如果没有，我会不会在最后一刻成功化身欧洲人呢？（好吧并不会）又或者，会不会屠皇大佬光速四杀开下把？
在这个游戏里，点点滴滴的瞬间都值得纪念下来。也许是在被护士瞬移砍倒之前惊险逃出大门的那个瞬间、也许是怨灵无声传送现形时与你擦身而过的那个瞬间……又或者，是某个将你从钩子上抱下来的人帮你扛了一刀、是某个从开局就躲着的队友在你倒地时义无反顾地给你拍了一根针。很厉害的人也会有失误，很不熟练的人也可以成为你的帮手。这个满是奇迹游戏里，似乎没有什么所谓的“必然”与“绝对”。
说起来是很意外的事。明明是带有恐怖色彩的游戏，却有着如此一批规模庞大的可爱的玩家们。这也许就是它受人欢迎的原因吧？
好吧，再来说说别的。
厄咒：8014是真的很让人头疼。打了一晚上的豆一秒消失，挫败感满满。卡蓝条还是会时不时出现，游戏bug已经成为特色。希望官方能够注意到玩家们的心声，我们最在乎的不是角色们光鲜亮丽的衣物，而是这个游戏本身。
鬼和人实力太悬殊了，我现在排一把遇到的几乎都是老鬼，各种完虐，开发组能不能用点脑子，调整平衡！

バージョンアップするたびにバグを直してまた新たなバグが生まれます。
圧倒的な民度の低さで、回線切りや煽りなど日常茶飯事で、酷いときにはグリッチが平然と行われています。
バランスも悪いし、とくにキラー側は苦行です。
新規で購入を検討しているなら別のゲームを買いましょう。もしくはコラボレーションしているホラー映画を観ましょう。
ゲーム自体は面白いのに悪質なプレイヤーと無能な運営がダメにしている、悲しい作品です。

2020年1月追記
新規でやろうとしている人は絶対に買わない方がいい。
特にキラーで遊ぼうと思っているのなら冗談抜きで新規が楽しめる環境、バランスではない。私自身はそこそこ長く遊んでいるが、現環境はあまりにも酷い。
まともな運営ならばたとえ一度バランス調整に失敗したとしても、再調整することでまた遊べるようになるが、ここの運営はまずバランスが崩壊していることにさえ気が付いていない。
それどころか、圧倒的に不利なキラー側がまだ強すぎると主張して弱体化を続ける予定だと言っている。次のアップデートでは上級者キラーの8割が使っているというほぼ必須パーク(装備できる能力のようなもの)の弱体化をするつもりだという発表があり、反対意見が公式フォーラムなどで多数挙がっているが、恐らくはそのまま実装される。
追い打ちをかけるように、現在、キラー不足とバグのせいで初心者キラーと最高ランク帯のキラーでもマッチングするようになっている。上級者4人と初心者1人が戦うゲームがまともだと言えるだろうか？

サバイバー側でのみ遊ぶならキラーほど苦痛ではない。とくにフレンドを集めてPTを組めるシステムがあるので、友達と一緒に遊ぶなら何故ここまで批判されるのか理解できないかもしれない。フラストレーションを感じると初心者サバイバーが運営に言えばそれに合わせて調整してくれるため、いずれは必ず勝てるようになる。査定もぬるいので一月も遊べばあなたも上級者の仲間入りである。
そんな環境であなたと遊んでくれるキラーが残っていればの話だが。

рекомендую

suppose this game's recommended system requirement is,
Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM

the minimum is,
Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB

I got,
Processor: Intel Core i7-6700iq
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GTX 950m

At the beginning, i can run the game menu on low at 60fps, around 30~32fps at ultra, but when i went from ultra back to low setting, sometimes i will only get 30fps, and then 40fps on high, and for some reasons, medium, puts me on 25fps. I still have around at least 50fps on both tutorials, but then when i tried to get into a game, i can't even reach 20fps, sometimes it drops down to 5fps, it's literally a slideshow when playing the game, as a survivor, i can't even move, the killer literally just showed up on my screen for 1 frame and the next time when my I can see myself again, i am already on the killer's shoulder, i haven't even played the game, i haven't even seen 75% of the map yet, not even exaggerating, the "system requirements" is probably referring to the menu, to actually play the game, you will need a much better PC, And why aren't there any sliders for individual settings like texture, AA, why is there only 4 graphic presets and that's it?

If you want to try to understand a certain game mechanic, status or whatever, you will never find your information in the game, most of the stuff is on the wiki, sometimes even wiki don't have the answer, so you have to go to the forum and see if anybody had asked the question before, or ask it yourself, so to start playing the game, you will be alt+tabing in and out of the game to look up what exhaustion is, what haste is, what is a totem, what is a token, what tokens have to do with the Hex totems, what crazed spirit for Hillbilly means, btw that's not even explained in the wiki, to find out what the things does, you'll have to use it yourself, or deliberated let a killer to use the thing on you. Another thing is that the states, sometimes in the description for the add-ons/perks or what not, tell you "XXX will considerably decrease YYY cooldown" or "XXX will slightly reduce the noise made YYY", funny enough, the description for another add-ons or perk, will actually tell you "XXX will increase 50% of YYY" something like that, and also numbers for increased range or something in meters like 6m or 8m, literally the game devs could have just turn everything into numbers, cuz the actual number of the "slightly" "moderately" "considerably" are known, they are on the wiki page, why you, the game devs, need to put a word for the numbers, and then explain the word's meaning on the wiki page? It gets worst if you are facing other killers that you are not familiar of, and all of a sudden you have even more game mechanics like doctor switching abilities, spirit world, dream world, jigsaw boxes, pool of devotion, all this game mechanics on the descriptions, you won't even know what they are until you got caught by the killer, and guess where all this infos are once again? The wiki page.

This is just stupid, and finally, it's not big of a deal, but i might as well point it out as well, the tutorial didn't even tell you half of everything, it just teach you how to win the game, but for example, afaik, it never tells you how to run, it never tells you how to use killer's power, until you check the control bindings and found out that you can do it, it also won't tell you how to use the pallets, if you are like me, playing under 20fps, at your screen you just blinked through it, i guess it will tell you when you walk near it, but for me it never told me cuz i just blinked through it, and i doubt if you are running to quickly when being chased by a killer, you'd also miss it and never know how to do it.

All in all, i will not recommend this game at all
不错的游戏，玩了一百小时了，

配信などを見てやってみたいなと思い購入しました。
最初のころは楽しかったですが運営の怠慢と無能ぶりに嫌気が差してきているこのごろです。
というのも、まともにバグも取り除けないし取る気もない、DLCは最初強烈な能力で実装し売り上げが落ち着いてきたら弱体化、など客を完全に馬鹿にしています。最近実装されたゴーストフェイスも落ち着いてきたら弱体化されるんでしょ？という考えが頭をよぎり、とてもじゃないですが買う気になれません。ゲームとしては唯一無二ですばらしいので非常にもったいないと思います。ぜひ大手に売り渡してまともな運営をしてもらいたいです。その方が皆幸せになれます。ちなみに当方、DLCはリージョン（＋ジョーイ）までは買いました。
Sehr schönes und nie langweilig werdendes Spiel!
